pnevma.vim - vim colorscheme
----------------------------
<a href="https://github.com/xeinye/pnevma.vim"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/82726847/327624459-a8212b4c-314a-4329-89e8-c66de623c697.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MY90xOknrLfJepvXyPSuqQndH0lBt5nhM3ojf_3wff0" width="40%" align="auto"></a>

pnevma is a simple colorscheme for vim written in vim9.

Installation
------------
Use a plugin manager or just copy pnevma.vim file to your vim colors directory.
